item.title: 濃厚チョコブラウニーキャラメル味 a.k.a. the best chocolate bar ever
item.description: 18:47 Tuesday 23 June 2015 JST I’m at the conveni chowing two Bourbon ChocoBrownie bars, the most amazing candy bar ever formulated by humankind. I’ve probably eaten 80 to 100 of them since they were released a couple months ago. UPC: 4 901360 314652 My comment on their site: これは神さまが自分で作りましたでしょうか？ 不思議最高な味。おめでとうございます。ありがとうございます。 God himself made this, right? It's unbelievably perfectly delicious. Congratulations; thank you.
